A toy that grows as you do! This My First Clock is the perfect learning aid for children from 4 years upwards – it starts out as a learning toy for telling the time, and morphs into your very own alarm clock! There are multiple dials included which increase in difficulty from simply showing the time of the day to a full clock face making this suitable for all abilities. Also included are 50 double sided quiz cards to be matched up either to the clock face or digitally. Once you’ve made your guess, simply lift the flap to check your answer! Perfect for children from 4 years of age!

 Included: 1 clock, 8x clock faces, 100 questions and answers.

        Requires 1 LR06-AA battery not included. Batteries are to be changed by an adult.

Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10) help brighten up maths learning! Each set of 10 Rainbow Calculators comes with five vibrant colours - one for every day of the school week to add some colour to your maths classes or brighten up home learning. Although the colours may be fun, the Rainbow Calculators do serious work: use these four-function calculators to check addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division equations on the eight-digit display, or discover more advanced calculations like square roots, percentages, and more. Simple to use for beginners and powerful enough for older students, these calculators' capabilities grow along with your skills. Each Rainbow Calculator operates with both solar and battery power, and also includes features such as auto shut-off, three-key memory, and more. This is a fantastic set for teachers to use in their maths lessons!  Educational Benefits of Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10) Mathematical Skills. Contains: 10 calculators (2 each of blue, green, purple, yellow and red). Multilingual guide. Size: 7 x 12cm. ﻿Age 3+ Educational Video of Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10)

description: This first Numberblocks ® puzzle helps little ones learn basic addition and subtraction skills with their friends the Numberblocks. There are 10 addition and 10 subtraction puzzles featuring Zero to Ten. Each Numberblocks addition puzzle and Numberblocks subtraction puzzle has 2 pieces. Match the simple maths question to the correct answer piece to complete the puzzle. Each clever puzzle fits together in a unique way so there’s only one right answer. This gives children a sense of achievement as they figure out the answers themselves. With this Numberblocks® jigsaw puzzle, children learn what happens when they add or subtract one. There are 10 addition puzzles and 10 subtraction puzzles featuring Numberblocks Zero to Ten. Each of these clever puzzles fits together in a unique way, which means there’s only one correct answer. This gives children a sense of achievement as they figure out the answers themselves. Made from durable card, the puzzles pieces store in the reusable box. Includes 20 x 2-piece puzzles. Completed puzzles measure 15cm L x 10cm W. Age 3+

Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10) help brighten up maths learning! Each set of 10 Rainbow Calculators comes with five vibrant colours - one for every day of the school week to add some colour to your maths classes or brighten up home learning. Although the colours may be fun, the Rainbow Calculators do serious work: use these four-function calculators to check addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division equations on the eight-digit display, or discover more advanced calculations like square roots, percentages, and more. Also included are 50 double sided quiz cards to be matched up either to the clock face or digitally. Once you’ve made your guess, simply lift the flap to check your answer! Perfect for children from 4 years of age! Included : 1 clock, 8x clock faces, 100 questions and answers. Requires 1 LR06-AA battery not included. Batteries are to be changed by an adult.

Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10) help brighten up maths learning! Each set of 10 Rainbow Calculators comes with five vibrant colours - one for every day of the school week to add some colour to your maths classes or brighten up home learning. Although the colours may be fun, the Rainbow Calculators do serious work: use these four-function calculators to check addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division equations on the eight-digit display, or discover more advanced calculations like square roots, percentages, and more. Simple to use for beginners and powerful enough for older students, these calculators' capabilities grow along with your skills. Each Rainbow Calculator operates with both solar and battery power, and also includes features such as auto shut-off, three-key memory, and more. This is a fantastic set for teachers to use in their maths lessons!  Educational Benefits of Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10) Mathematical Skills. description: This first Numberblocks ® puzzle helps little ones learn basic addition and subtraction skills with their friends the Numberblocks. There are 10 addition and 10 subtraction puzzles featuring Zero to Ten. Each Numberblocks addition puzzle and Numberblocks subtraction puzzle has 2 pieces. Match the simple maths question to the correct answer piece to complete the puzzle. Each clever puzzle fits together in a unique way so there’s only one right answer. This gives children a sense of achievement as they figure out the answers themselves. With this Numberblocks® jigsaw puzzle, children learn what happens when they add or subtract one. There are 10 addition puzzles and 10 subtraction puzzles featuring Numberblocks Zero to Ten. Each of these clever puzzles fits together in a unique way, which means there’s only one correct answer. This gives children a sense of achievement as they figure out the answers themselves. Made from durable card, the puzzles pieces store in the reusable box. Includes 20 x 2-piece puzzles. Completed puzzles measure 15cm L x 10cm W. Age 3+

This My First Clock is the perfect learning aid for children from 4 years upwards – it starts out as a learning toy for telling the time, and morphs into your very own alarm clock! Learning Resources Rainbow Calculators (Set of 10) help brighten up maths learning! Each set of 10 Rainbow Calculators comes with five vibrant colours - one for every day of the school week to add some colour to your maths classes or brighten up home learning. Although the colours may be fun, the Rainbow Calculators do serious work: use these four-function calculators to check addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division equations on the eight-digit display, or discover more advanced calculations like square roots, percentages, and more. Simple to use for beginners and powerful enough for older students, these calculators' capabilities grow along with your skills. Each Rainbow Calculator operates with both solar and battery power, and also includes features such as auto shut-off, three-key memory, and more.
